name: Classic Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and cheese on a toasted bun.

name: Cheese Fries
description: Crispy fries topped with melted cheddar cheese.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

name: Chicken Nuggets
description: Tender chicken pieces breaded and fried to perfection.

name: Veggie Wrap
description: A healthy wrap with mixed veggies, hummus, and avocado.

name: Chocolate Shake
description: Rich and creamy chocolate milkshake topped with whipped cream.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Freshly grilled salmon served with lemon butter sauce.

name: Tacos
description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, and cheese.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

name: Buffalo Wings
description: Spicy chicken wings served with blue cheese dip.

name: French Toast
description: Thick slices of bread soaked in egg batter, fried, and topped with syrup.

name: Steak Frites
description: Juicy steak served with a side of crispy fries.

name: Greek Salad
description: A fresh salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Pasta in a creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken.

name: Ice Cream Sundae
description: Vanilla ice cream with chocolate sauce, nuts, and a cherry on top.

name: BLT Sandwich
description: Crispy bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich on toasted bread.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and bean sprouts.

name: Margarita
description: Classic cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and Cointreau.

name: Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and strawberry topping.
